Content: Ok I need to get this of my chest and rant rn
I fucking hate the r/pewdiepiesubmissions sub right now!
and no_ I don't hate pewds. Quite the opposite actually
this guy is posting memes defending Notch and continues to defend his tweets in the comments
The post has reached 7.6k karma already and a lot of people either side with him knowing full well what happens or just attack without searching why Notch has been removed from the start up screen{
Only recently people started to downvote him but I'm still angry because of people like him that Felix is compared to fascists and alt-rights
Meh I take any positive messages rn so thanks!
